meta.label: sync from blob storage to synapse
meta.description: This recipe replaces the sync recipe between blob storage and synapse

inputRoles.name: input_dataset
inputRoles.label: Input adlsgen2 dataset
inputRoles.description: This connection must be a adlsgen2 (blob storage) dataset

outputRoles.name: output_dataset
outputRoles.label: synapse dataset
outputRoles.description: This dataset should only be a synapse connection
